        private void calculatePosition(Paddle paddle)
        Calculates a current position of a paddle for a controller. All coordinates should lay in the range (0, 1).
        Parameters:
        paddle - for which the current position is calculated.

      • getClosestBall

        private Ball getClosestBall(Paddle paddle,
                            Ball otherBall)
        Finds the closest ball for the given paddle.
        Parameters:
        paddle - the closest ball will be found for the given paddle.
        otherBall - the closest ball if you want to find the next closest ball.
        Returns:
        the closest ball for the given paddle.
